msg: Move the definition of the 'clean' target out of build-common.xml and into the build file of every sub-project, so that the build-common.xml file can be reused by the master build file

msg: Adapt a different strategy for calling into the servlet-sample build for running the integration tests:
- instead of a target per container, only one 'test' target
- pass the properties for the directory layout into the sub-build, so it doesn't mess with our main directories
